title: 24 hour Emergency Maintenance Response Guarantee, Easy highway access
posting_body: ['Virtual and Contact-Free Leasing and Move-In Available', '- Self-Guided Tours with Lockboxes', '- FaceTime/Skype Tours', '- Apply & Sign Online', 'Welcome to Concord Towers', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 23', 'OR Text', '23', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 925 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Enjoy peaceful living in a vibrant downtown setting at your new home.', 'Our community was designed for convenience and enjoyment.', 'We are surrounded by beautiful downtown Madison Heights with numerous restaurants, theaters, art galleries and more.', 'Oakland Mall is also just a short walk away and home to many brand-name shops.', 'You will immediately see why residents are drawn to our unique mix of peaceful living within a cosmopolitan setting.', 'Features:', 'Well designed floor plans ranging from 825 to 925 square feet, Satin nickel hardware throughout residence, Beautifully designed kitchen featuring maple cabinetry, GE white appliances and dark walnut vinyl plank flooring, Walk in closets, Spacious living room, dining room and bedrooms featuring plush neutral carpet, Soft hued paint accented with white paneled doors', 'Community Amenities:', '24 hour fitness center.,', 'Walking distance to Oakland Mall, AMC Theater, and local shopping.', ', Easy highway access, Cat friendly, Online Resident Portal, 24 hour Emergency Maintenance Response Guarantee', 'Pet Policy', 'You may have a maximum of two cats in your home.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'dzeR5znGSV91']
